Text: South Park at its best! I laughed til I cried. Yes they're mean to Scientology but they had it coming. Since they quote verbatim from Hubbard's own teachings, it's not so much taking a piss at the church as exposing them as the dumbasses they really are.
Great Stuff, anyone know if they are going to screen this one in the UK ?
Really fun episode. Its really hilarious how they brin up those really disturbing/comical sides of that religion. I agree with pruttlukt, they had it coming!
